name: Grab Pack Play - Horror Puzzle
description: The horror puzzle game is now available for you to experience the dark stories of an old toy factory full of monster dolls. Explore the secrets behind each level and see the stories more and more tied together. Huggy monster just wants to hug you out of breath. Try to use your grab pack machine to escape tricky situations. You can use a grab pack to sneakily grab an item or grab yourself out of dangerous positions. As you explore the factory, you will collect many things to uncover the deep secret of why the huggy monster constantly chases for you. Play now to find out.
